LanguageData.Keno_AutonomyPaused.stages.0.label: autonomy paused (brief)
LanguageData.Keno_AutonomyPaused.stages.0.description: Someone is making decisions for me. It's a bit frustrating, but I can handle it for now.
LanguageData.Keno_AutonomyPaused.stages.1.label: autonomy paused (hours)
LanguageData.Keno_AutonomyPaused.stages.1.description: I've been unable to decide my own work for a while now. It's getting tiresome.
LanguageData.Keno_AutonomyPaused.stages.2.label: autonomy paused (days)
LanguageData.Keno_AutonomyPaused.stages.2.description: It's been days since I could choose my own tasks. I feel like a puppet.
LanguageData.Keno_AutonomyPaused.stages.3.label: autonomy paused (extended)
LanguageData.Keno_AutonomyPaused.stages.3.description: I've lost all say in what I do. My will means nothing here.
LanguageData.Keno_AutonomyPaused_Wanted.stages.0.desc: Someone is making decisions for me. It's a bit frustrating, but I can handle it for now.
LanguageData.Keno_AutonomyPaused_Wanted.stages.1.desc: I've been unable to decide my own work for a while now. It's getting tiresome.
LanguageData.Keno_AutonomyPaused_Wanted.stages.2.desc: It's been days since I could choose my own tasks. I feel like a puppet.
LanguageData.Keno_AutonomyPaused_Wanted.stages.3.desc: I've lost all say in what I do. My will means nothing here.
LanguageData.Keno_AutonomyDisabled_Social_Wanted.stag: They shouldn't let others decide for them.
LanguageData.Keno_AutonomyPaused_Unnecessary.stages.0: I prefer to let others decide what I am best suited for.
LanguageData.Keno_AutonomyWanted_Social_Unnecessary.s: They shouldn't force people to manage themselves.
